poem:
"Evocations of Madrid"

Sensation, a book,
in Madrid - with childlike view:
Transition from grey to hue.
Her city - no party brew,
but a memory spinning anew.
Seven weeks, words flew,
Thirteen tongues, perception grew. 
Her tale, old yet ever new,
Echoing times, painfully true.
